name: Wolf Slayer
description: A title given to those who have hunted wolves.

name: The Monarch
description: A title for the one who stands above all.

name: Fire Aura
description: Engulfs your messages in a fiery glow.

name: Lightning Speed
description: Makes your username crackle with energy.

name: Shadow Veil
description: Cloaks your presence in dark energy.

name: Minor Healing Potion
description: A simple potion to restore a small amount of health.
